zone: Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh City District
circumstances: During the takeoff roll at Saigon-Tan Son Nhat Airport, the right main gear and the nose gear collapsed for unknown reason. The aircraft went out of control, veered off runway and came to rest. While all four crew members were uninjured, the aircraft was damaged beyond repair.
probable_cause: Undercarriage collapsed or 'retraction' during takeoff for undetermined reason.
